blogs.title: Introduction to Keycloak
blogs.summary:
In this post we will cover the installation of keyloak using the distribution file on a Windows machine.Extract the zip file to a folder on your machine.bat start
--proxy edge
--hostname-strict=false
--hostname-strict-https=false
--https-port=443
--https-certificate-file=C:\Tools\keycloak-21.You can download the distribution zip file and extract it.log"
--log-file-output=json
```

This starts the Keycloak server in a development-ready configuration with HTTPS, hostname validation disabled for development, and logging to file for troubleshooting.
